page.title: 11INDUSTRIES IN HELMSHORE.
page.content:
Over the years industries have changed a lot. All industries used to be cotton mills like Higher Mill museum. Most of Helmshore's industries are on Holcombe road. There are many factories that make lots of strange things like X-Ray protection, paper products and many other things. Once Helmshore was a little village which had two cotton mills where nearly everybody worked. Today the industries are much more varied in their products.
On Holcombe Road there is a motor vehicle dismantlers, two welding shops, a textile manufacturer, a paper producer, and two garages.
